methods.name: fixupAnnoations
methods.comment: Makes adjustments as necessary to any annotations in the given text.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program associated with the comment

methods.name: getDisplayString
methods.comment:
Returns the display string for the given raw annotation text.  Annotations are 
 encoded strings that fit this pattern: .  This method
 will parse the given text, converting any annotations into their display version.

methods.name: parseTextForAnnotations
methods.comment: Parses the given text looking for annotations.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program from which to get information

params.name: prototypeString
params.comment:
The reference string used to determine the attributes of any 
         newly created AttributedString.

params.name: row
params.comment: the row of the newly created FieldElement
